markdownRemark.html:
After a long hiatus from PHP, I am now working on a server that uses it, so it’s time to get up to date with some of the more modern PHP frameworks like Lumen, Laravel, and Slim.

I want to grab

<?php
function hello() {
    return "World";
}
?>

Deployment on Linode

I selected an Ubuntu 18.04 LTS image. It took about a minute to deploy.

sudo apt install nginx
sudo apt install mariadb-server php-mysql
sudo mysql -u root

CREATE DATABASE testdb; CREATE USER ‘testuser’ IDENTIFIED BY ‘password’; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON testdb.* TO ‘testuser’;

sudo mysqlsecureinstallation

sudo apt install php-fpm

sudo sed -i ‘s/;cgi.fixpathinfo=1/cgi.fixpathinfo=0/g’ /etc/php/7.2/fpm/php.ini

sudo mkdir -p /var/www/html/example.com/public_html
